parsed_description.description: A data reporting role that involves building data pipelines, unlocking new data sources, and using quantitative analysis to cover various topics.
responsibilities: Identify great stories powered by data and pitch new ideas
Help create replicable workflows for cloud computing processes
Partner with journalists across the team and newsroom
Acquire data, conduct statistical analysis, and pursue traditional lines of reporting

benefits: Competitive medical, dental and vision coverage
Three weeks of vacation and up to three weeks of paid sick leave
Nine paid holidays and two personal days
20 weeks paid parental leave for any new parent

parsed_description.jobDescription: Design, develop, and deploy web and mobile applications, lead technical teams, and drive technical excellence
keyResponsibilities: Full Stack Development: Develop and maintain robust end-to-end web and mobile solutions
Cloud-Native Expertise: Drive adoption and implementation of cloud-native technologies and practices
JavaScript & Node.js: Utilize deep knowledge of JavaScript, Node.js, and related frameworks
Microservices & API Design: Architect and develop scalable microservices and APIs
Database Design & Optimization: Design and optimize database schemas
DevOps Integration: Collaborate with DevOps teams to ensure robust CI/CD pipelines
Code Quality: Conduct thorough code reviews and enforce coding standards
Agile Leadership: Take a leadership role in Agile processes
Technical Problem-Solving: Lead resolution of complex technical challenges
requirements: 1+ years of experience in full stack development with cloud-native applications
Expertise in JavaScript/Node.js and associated frameworks/libraries
Knowledge of modern front-end frameworks and CSS preprocessors
Proven experience in architecting and implementing complex microservices architectures and RESTful APIs
Expertise in designing and managing SQL and NoSQL databases
Extensive experience with CI/CD pipelines, Docker, Kubernetes, and Infrastructure as Code tools
Demonstrated ability to lead technical teams and mentor junior engineers
Strong experience in Agile development processes
benefits: Comprehensive Medical, Dental, and Vision plans
Health Savings Account with company contribution
100% employer-paid Life, AD&D and Short- and Long-Term Disability Insurance
401k with Traditional and Roth options, including employer match
Paid Parental and Pregnancy Recovery Leave

companyInfo.mission: Protect corporate executives and high-profile individuals in their personal lives
companyInfo.productCategory: New product category with impressive client base of Fortune 500 companies
companyInfo.culture: Dynamic work environment, competitive salary, exceptional benefits

parsed_description.description: StackAdapt is seeking a Salesforce Developer to join their SaaS IT Business Applications team. The successful candidate will build, maintain, and improve Salesforce Sales Cloud and Marketing Cloud solutions.
keyResponsibilities: Design, develop, test, and implement Salesforce Sales Cloud and Marketing Cloud business processes and system integrations
Build and deploy SaaS system integrations, workflows, and architecture to scale and automate Lead to Cash process
Provide application support and technical administration of Sales & Marketing SaaS applications
Configure, build, and enhance out-of-the-box Salesforce functionality
Manage operational and reporting requests, troubleshoot issues, and implement security related to profiles, permission sets, and role-based access
requirements: 3-5 years of strong technical experience implementing and supporting Salesforce Sales & Marketing Cloud
Hands-on experience with other Sales enablement SaaS applications
Technical background in application integration tools and native APIs
Expertise in developing Lightning Components, APEX, VF Page, LWC, Aura Component development, SSJS, SQL, HTML, AMPscript, SOQL-SOSL
Experience with Lightning Process builder flows, workflow rules, Connect API, and Quick Action
Proficiency in Salesforce platform features and CRM concepts
Knowledge of DevOps and continuous integration/deployment (CI/CD) processes
niceToHave: Salesforce certifications (Platform Developer I or II, App Builder, or Administrator)
Experience in Agile or Scrum software development methodology

otherBenefits: 3 weeks vacation + 3 personal care days + 1 Culture & Belief day + Birthdays Off
Access to a comprehensive mental health care platform
Full benefits from day one of employment
Coverage and support of personal development initiatives
